summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 47th Avenue West from West Bertona Street to Emerson Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by gravelling and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 8884 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
